channel.title: Project PerfectScape
channel.description:
So heres the idea. Im starting to work new project. The mission of the project is.. To complete new starte source. With everything Server Gui Auto Restarter and many more! I believe nobody trusts me at MoparScape forums but i dont need help. I just need feedback. Wich one PK or NonPK? And then i will start to create a PerfectScape to noobs who ar starting prvate server programin. So do i do thserver PK or No PK because i need information wich one starters usually pick.
Yes, i know nobody even knows me here.If anyone have ever played on my server (PimpScapePKz) they know me pretty well. My oer nick Nimion. Some people knows me ike that. And mods plese report if this is in wrong section. ;)

item.title: Project PerfectScape
item.dc:creator: @indiankid indiankid
item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

Nasgul:

Yea. But i think some starters (noobs) wants otherways PK server because they are more fun. And i think they are more challenging. Otherways in NonPk is more to code and the server is bigger.

how is a nonpk source bigger? it is the samething… and you can code everything in to a pk server like smithing, fishing, wc, mining, fletching, crafting…and so on…

Read full topic

item.title: Project PerfectScape
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

You Complain That TestScape And Project16 ‘Suck’(Sorry I’m Not Swearing I’m Quoting)
At The End Of The Day Its UP TO The Person What They Use You Cant Just Be Mean Because Of It.
Read How To Behave On A Forum! :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Project PerfectScape
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

So basically all your going to do, is take an already made source, edit the hell out of it.

Then host it for other people to download.

Why not just make it for-yourself and that won’t help the noobs, just spoil them. If the source already has everything and goes a sucess, then everyone will have the same kind of server and will be boring as hell.

Well anyways, if you are going to create one anyways, then just make a non-pk server with the most ammount of things that can get close to the real runescape.

Now if you were going to make a pk server that would be different, I would suggest you make everything VERY different then the REAL runescape.

Good Luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Project PerfectScape
item.dc:creator: @Nasgul Nasgul
item.description:
@Nasgul wrote:

Oh, how i create it? Simple i will just need to get everythingas easy edtabeas i can. I will add there everything it needs. Server Gui. Some Handlers and maybe real Restartr like Anime’s in Rune server. Havenät seen the topi here. But whe its done i will release it here. Of course.
Here re my plans now…
-Server Gui
-ClanHandlers.
-Anti Null
And some more thati will get from the forums.
But the hardest part is the lag. If i add too much stff the server will lag.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2007, 12:07:06 PM[/size][hr]Maye i will create Non-PK because its really better to start coding. And maybe esier to code them. Butwich source? TestScape or Projectt 16?
Sorry about missing letters. While im osting a sever they ll wont come when i press them.

Read full topic

item.title: Project PerfectScape
item.dc:creator: @devull devull
item.description:
@devull wrote:

no non-pk is the best. it makes more space for exploration and keep the game more level like if you just started you wudnt want people to kill you when you step out of the bank

item.title: Project PerfectScape
item.dc:creator: @indiankid indiankid
item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

and i have a couple questions…

how do u expect to create this “perfectscape” server? i would love to see it when it is done.

umm and servers like testscape already have a built in auto restarter… you just have to go in anitlagg and just change the “999” in the timer to how much time you want it.

and don’t be mean and refer to starters or new commers as noobs…

thank you and good luck!

Indian

Read full topic

item.title: Project PerfectScape
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Pk servers are popular, but since you are making a starter server fo newbies I suggest you make it non-pk. If they want to get the Pk server then they can just add stuff needed. ( By asking help of course…=)
